ovdesc.p: Application to describe the Actions allowed for Property classes and specify if Accounting is valid for a product line or not.

desc.p: Key to the application. Should be a Valid Property class and Action separated by 'Hyphen' .For eg - TERM.AMOUNT-INCREASE
New records can be released only by Temenos
Contains the Property class of ID component
Provides a short description of the AA.PROPERTY.CLASS.ACTION

Indicates to which product line is this action relevant. Certain actions may be exclusive only to certain lines. For example, ISSUE.PAYOFF would not exist for DEPOSITS/ACCOUNTS product lines since it is relevant only to Loans.
When an ACTION is defined it may or may not generate an accounting event. This field indicates that the action could generate accounting movements for the associated Product Line
Valid options are NULL, YES and NO. NULL and NO are same .
If YES, then BALANCE.PREFIX must be present for Associated Product line in AA.PROPERTY.CLASS for the property class in ID.Component

An Action is performed on a property of the specified class as part of a business Activity. The actions that comprise an activity will depend upon the property, product line and type of business event being processed.
Examples of ACTIONS are ACCRUE, CALCULATE, CHANGE, DECREASE, DISBURSE, DRAW, INCREASE and UPDATE. The actions available will depend on the property class and its behaviour.
Describes the AA.PROPERTY.CLASS.ACTION and is used for enrichment.

This field can be expanded to allow the User to enter the Description of the AA.PROPERTY.CLASS.ACTION in various languages. Each expansion of the field will correspond to a new Language as defined in the LANGUAGE table (Ref: GENERAL TABLES), and will indicate to the User the Language in which the Description must be entered.
